definition: to dispel (enmity, misunderstandings etc)/to vanish (of misgivings, differences of opinion)/thaw (in relations)
ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine
to explain/to release/Buddha (abbr. for 釋迦牟尼|释迦牟尼[Shi4 jia1 mou2 ni2])/Buddhism
to melt away (idiom)/to dissipate/to vanish
to forget previous differences/to bury the hatchet

sentences.english: In this way, the divergences between relevant documents can be interpreted easily.
sentences.chinese: 如此，則相關文獻記載的分歧與矛盾可以渙然冰釋。

sentences.english: The misunderstanding between us has been cleared up.
sentences.chinese: 我們之間的誤會渙然冰釋。

sentences.english: We've waited six months for him to remedy the breach.
sentences.chinese: 六個月以來我們一直等待他們能夠冰釋前嫌。

sentences.english: Even Aunt Addie's hostility melted temporarily.
sentences.chinese: 甚至艾迪姨媽的敵意也暫時得以冰釋。

sentences.english: In the KaDing under repeated explanations, two into finally animosity, reconciliation. Mrs.
sentences.chinese: 在卡丁的再三解釋下，二入終於冰釋前嫌，和好如初。

definition: the shrike and the swallow fly in different directions (idiom)/(usually of a couple) to part from each other
lit. bleak wind and icy rain (idiom)/fig. hardships/miserable circumstances
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
needlework/sewing
paper wedding (first year wedding anniversary)
lit. small belly, chicken's gut (idiom); narrow-minded/petty
grand dreams/unrealistic ideas (idiom)
to whisper to one another's ear
(Buddhism) predestined relationship
keenly felt pain/bitter anguish
lonely soul/solitary
as if dumb/speechless
to forget previous differences/to bury the hatchet
to refute/to demolish (an argument, theory etc)
protective coloration/camouflage
true sentiments are seen in hard times (idiom)/you see who your true friends are when you go through tough times together/you see who your true friends are when you are in difficulties
